document_data.name: Mount Ieldroun
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Ieldroun''' was one of the two tallest mountains east from the [[Moon Pass]].
document_data.History: The mountain peak was named for a long dead [[orc]] chieftain.
document_data.Geography:
Ieldroun stood halfway between [[Stone Stand]] and the site of [[Hellgate Keep]]. 
Between Mount Ieldroun and [[Mount Thorog]] was [[Telkoun's Tower]], a stronghold of a little-known [[wizard]] and protected by [[peryton]]s.
